extendedInfo.description: 80,000+ businesses and services throughout the U.S. listed both in Japanese & English!Looking for a sushi joint near you? Trying to find out about your favorite anime?The CompassX2 App is here to help you! Use it to search for places to Eat, Drink, Shop, Relax, and Play!*Search businesses and services near you:Results can be displayed in order of whatâs closest to your current location or by category.*Search by keyword, category, business name, street, city, or zip code:Business pages contains general information, URL, hours, services, photos, and you can upload new photos!*Reviews and recommendations:Check the reputation and popularity of businesses you find and rate them from your App.*Special Sales & Events:Find sales, discounts, coupons, & event information near you.Simply touch a phone number to call or touch a URL to jump to the website.Japan Publicity, Inc.385 Van Ness Ave., #110, Torrance, CA 90501, U.S.A.(310) 294-5777info@CompassX2.comCompassX2.comkeywords: cx2app, compassapp, apptele, yellow pages, yellowpage, japanese, american, restaurants, directory, sushi, sake, anime

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: This App is pretty useful if you\'re in the South Bay area. It\'s organized and easy to manage. I like it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sugoi! This app is awesome. I\'ve used it in L.A. and in Oregon and it is so useful and easy to use. Great to get to rate & upload photos of restaurants and shops. I\'m using it every day.
reviews.author: A Google User
